newProperties.name: Thumbnail
newProperties.description: URL to playlist thumbnail: NOTE: Should be an https link to an image of ratio 16:9, ideally 1280 pixels wide by 720 pixels tall, with a minimum width of 640 pixels, in JPEG or PNG format.

newProperties.name: Language
newProperties.description: The main language used in the playlist.

newProperties.name: Link
newProperties.description: A link to the creators page.

newProperties.name: Publication Status
newProperties.description: The publication status of the playlist.

newProperties.name: Curation Status
newProperties.description: The publication status of the playlist set by the a content curator on the platform.

newProperties.name: Explicit
newProperties.description: Indicates whether the playlist contains explicit material.
